page.title: 10LIMERIGG PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school bell rings at 9.15am. School finishes at 3.30pm. In between that time we have a morning interval lasting 15 minutes,three-quarters of an hour for lunch and an afternoon interval which also lasts for 15 minutes. There are 32 pupils in our school and 2 permanent teachers. We don't have a uniform,but we always try to wear sensible clothing. We are taught Mathematics,Language Arts,Expressive Arts,Environmental Studies and Religous Education. Our class teacher is Miss Lowe,but we also have four visiting specialist teachers. They take us for Art,Gymnastics,Recorder Tuition and Remedial Education. The minister takes a morning assembly once a week. We have Reading homework 4 nights a week and sometimes we have written homework to do also.
